name: nasa-project
description: Scheculing and managing launching missions for NASA

scripts.install: concurrently " npm run install-server"  " npm run install-client"
scripts.watch: concurrently " npm run server"  " npm run client"
scripts.deploy: concurrently "npm run build --prefix client" "npm start --prefix server"
scripts.test: concurrently " npm run test --prefix server" " npm run test --prefix client"
